commands.name: commands
commands.description: Sends you a list of available commands.

promote.name: promote
promote.description: Promotes a member to the specified role.

options.name: role
options.description: Role to promote the user to

demote.name: demote
demote.description: Demotes a member of the specified role.

options.name: role
options.description: Role to demote the user of

factions.name: factions
factions.description: Sends you a list of joinable factions and which factions you already belong to.

join.name: join
join.description: Join a faction. Use the /factions command to see a list of all faction.

leave.name: leave
leave.description: Leave a faction. Use the /factions command to see a list of all factions.

uncaptain.name: uncaptain
uncaptain.description: Makes a user no longer a captain.

options.name: user
options.description: User to make no longer a captain

request.name: request
request.description: Requests a role and notifies members who can provide it.
